posts.post_title: Scarce Connie Mack Post Card--Evening Telegraph $450
posts.post_content: Selling---Connie Mack Post Card---The Evening Telegraph--Circa 1907-10--(really not sure on year)  but I know it is a tough postcard  $450----Nice Condition--check scans--somewhere along the line, somebody taped the back where it was a tear I would say.----thanks,  Don
